config.text: Beaumont Tree Inventory Dashboard

City of Beaumont

Urban Forest Dashboard


This dashboard is designed to allow you to more easily interact with the City of Beaumont tree inventory, track and manage service requests, and explore canopy coverage breakdowns by neighbourhood, park, and street.


Beaumont's urban forest currently includes:


﻿﻿COUNT({OBJECTID})﻿﻿ Publicly Managed Trees


﻿﻿COUNT({Name_Speci})﻿﻿ Different Species


﻿﻿CurrentCanopy﻿﻿% Canopy Coverage (Current Boundary)


﻿2017Canopy%﻿% Canopy Coverage (2017 Boundary)


﻿



To see information on a specific tree, click "Tree Info" above!

config.noDataMessage: Select a tree on the map to view its details.
Select a tree on the map to edit notes.

config.text: Above should include: Species, Danger Flags, Year planted (update 0 to unknown),
